title: I’m Here To Find My Missing Companion - Novel Updates
tags: Amnesia   Appearance Different from Actual Age   Beautiful Female Lead   Charismatic Protagonist   Couple Growth   Cute Protagonist   Dragon Slayers   Dragons   European Ambience   Fated Lovers   Female Protagonist   God Protagonist   Gods   Handsome Male Lead   Jealousy   Kind Love Interests   Knights   Loneliness   Long Separations   Love at First Sight   Magic   Misunderstandings   Near-Death Experience   Nobles   Royalty   Strong Love Interests   Torture
author: JK리아
description:
She used to be a goddess, but she was punished and turned into a white dragon.

The magnificent Dragon Lord she encountered a few days after she opened her eyes told…

“Come along with me.”

“As a companion?”

“We are destined to spend the rest of our lives together.”

As a result, she chose to become Lord’s companion in exchange for meeting God.

However, after a while as a pet…

Without saying anything, the hardworking Dragon Lord abandoned her “Yu-hee'(playing) in the human world!

“How come Lord isn’t here?”

She finally came out into the human realm after waiting for 199 years. To meet him, who will be a human being.

“Are you implying that I’m Lady’s companion?”

“But you’re definitely my companion… Why are you acting as if you don’t know who I am?”

A fun romance tale about a dragon female protagonist who ventured into the human world to play!>
